text: Robert Hutton (died 23 August 1870) was an Irish Whig politician. Hutton was first elected Whig MP for at the 1837 general election but was defeated at the next election in 1841. ==References== ==External links== * Category:UK MPs 1837–1841 Category:Whig (British political party) MPs for Irish constituencies Category:1870 deaths
title: Robert Hutton (politician)
